bibl.bibl: Lovén, Sven. 1872a. Études sur les Échinoïdées. [Read 12 June 1872.] Kongliga Svenska Vetenskaps-Akademiens Handlingar 11 (1874): no. 7, pp. 1–91.
bibl.idno: Online BHL and also at archimer.ifremer.fr/doc/00034/14488/11789.pdf NB: From Marginalia it seems CD's copy has 1875 on the cover, like that at archimer, but that and the BHL one also have a title page with 1874.
